## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bb3142d916465f0f107725634796d3f9ae4f976d8ecd64e64ba0b0ba89e3018d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@lensapp/eslint-config' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
